com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities

Class SharedPrefsEncrypted

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pgmacdesign.pgmactips.utilities.SharedPrefsEncrypted

  • public class SharedPrefsEncrypted
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for SharedPreferences handling. It utilizes Scottyab's secure-preferences for encryption purposes. This class uses his library, which is listed below: Secure Shared Prefs. Link: https://github.com/scottyab/secure-preferences compile 'com.scottyab:secure-preferences-lib:0.1.4' Created by pmacdowell on 2017-07-13.

                                                                   java.lang.String encryptionPassword)
        Method for building an encrypted set of shared prefs
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        sharedPrefsName - prefs name
        encryptionPassword - the password. If null, it will not have a password
        Returns:
        Shared Prefs (encrypted) object
